
## List comprehension

```sh
animals = [' aap ', ' aap ', 'aap ']
[x.strip() for x in animals]
[x.strip() for x in animals if 'i' in x]
```

## Dictionary

```sh
>>> iupac = {'A':'Ala','C':'Cys','E':'Glu'}
>>> print('C stands for the amino acid {0}', iupac['C'])
#> C stands for the amino acid Cys
```
